p: To the thus-produced solution, 1-[4-(2-hydroxyethoxy)-phenyl]-2-hydroxy-2-methyl-1-propan-1-one (Irgacure 2959, product of Ciba Specialty Chemicals K.K.) serving as a photopolymerization initiator was added in an amount of 3 wt.% with respect to the resin content of the solution, to thereby produce a photosensitive resin composition.
